articles.content:
Facebook will soon begin testing partnerships with a small group of independent writers for its new publishing platform, sources tell Axios.

articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: Instagram will no longer let adults message teens who don’t follow them - The Verge
articles.description: Instagram has banned adults from DMing teenage users who don’t follow them. It will also show teen users “safety prompts” when talking to suspicious adults. The company says it wants to do more to protect its youngest users.
articles.content:
Teen users will also be shown safety prompts when messaging suspicious adults
Adults are now unable to message teenage users that dont follow them. 
Image: Instagram
